title: Sun in Cancer
summary: A period that centers care, belonging, and emotional attunement. Attention turns toward home base, memory, and the supports that help people feel safe enough to act.

meaning.headline: The environment favors nurturing what feels like home and protecting what matters.

frames.text: With the Sun in Cancer, the collective tone softens toward protection, care, and consolidation.
This is a season for tending roots, memory, and the people or places that provide shelter.
Feelings inform decisions; intuition about safety runs louder.
Slower pacing supports emotional digestion and regrouping.
Everyone will withdraw or become overly sentimental.

frictions: Taking things personally when stakes are practical
Avoiding necessary change to preserve comfort
Expecting others to intuit needs without asking
opportunities: Repairing or tending to home spaces
Holding space for feelings before making moves

do: Check in on the people and projects you steward.
Create or refresh routines that help you feel anchored.
Use quiet time to process emotions before choosing next steps.
Name needs directly instead of hinting.
Protect rest as much as output.
avoid: Holding onto grievances without airing them
Avoiding decisions to keep everyone comfortable
Expecting constant availability from yourself or others

reusable_lines.text: This is a season to nurture roots and reinforce safety.
Protective choices keep the work and the people steady now.

forbidden_claims: Identity claims about being a Cancer
allowed_framing: Environmental focus on care and protection
Agency-based choices for boundaries and support

sources: Sun in Cancer as collective focus on care and belonging
